greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n / A285707(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: For n > 1, a(n) = n / gcd(n, A079277(n)).
program: def a007947(n): return max(i for i in divisors(n) if core(i) == i)
def a285707(n): return 1 if n==1 else gcd(n, a079277(n))
print([n//a285707(n) for n in range(1, 151)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Apr 27 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 26 2017
